en.module: Evaluations are not part of your Pivot Software Suite,
en.pitch: Need a faster, more organized way to handle staff evaluations? Need a system that can be customized to your rubrics, your formulas, and your plan? The Staff Evaluation Dashboard helps you observe and know exactly where your staff are scoring according to state adopted staff evaluation models and your own evaluation criteria at a glance enabling you to make decisions about professional development before it is too late. The Staff Evaluation module supports unlimited and customized rubrics including RISE, 5D+, Thoughtful Classroom, and many more!
